WorkItem.ClosedComment: User will need to repost, and put some effort into it.
WorkItem.Description: Im having trouble loading my character from the Armory after i have installed Windows 7. I have my Enhance Shammy saved on my hard drive and i can load that into Rawr but still have trouble with optimiser saying it still has trouble with my weps since they are not unique even though i go into the edit page for the wepons and tick the unique box. Rawr also has trouble with my Wrist and leg enchant.
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Problems with Rawr after Installing Windows 7

Comments.Message: None of that makes any sense. Post your specific problems, following the posting guidelines, and we may be able to help.
